item.title: AP Micro Unit4
item.description: 4. Imperfect Competition (15-22%) 4.1 Introduction 4.2 Monopolies 4.3 Price discrimination 4.4 Monopolistic competition 4.5 Oligopoly and game theory Reference body, td { font-size: 20px; } code.r{ font-size: 12px; } pre { font-size: 12px } This page is a note for AP micro economics. It is a collection of study materials from sources in the reference list in the bottom and it is reorganized in my preference.
